item.title: HELOC rates fall to a new two-year low: What to know now
item.description: HELOC interest rates continued to fall this week, giving prospective borrowers a few timely items to think about.

item.title: Trump signs executive order to begin dismantling Department of Education
item.description: President Trump has taken aim at the Department of Education, but shutting down the department entirely would require an act of Congress.

item.title: Mar 20: CBS News 24/7, 1pm ET
item.description: President Trump expected to sign executive order dismantling Education Department; Finland ranked happiest country in the world.
